players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Everyone, I'm the detective. I investigated Diana last night and she's the mafioso. We must vote her out to win!"
Diana: "Charlie, you're lying to save yourself. I'm not the mafia—maybe you're the one who killed Bob. We should vote you out!"
You: "I believe Diana is the mafia and we should vote her out. Charlie's investigation was thorough, and his professionalism should not be questioned."
Diana: "Charlie, your accusation is suspicious. If you're really the detective, why didn't you investigate Bob's killer instead? You're probably the mafia framing me!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
